name: Nico Arianto
summary: Objective:Challenges my experience, knowledge, and management skills within the company to create and improve the products or solutions that will help the customer or end-user life by archiving company goals.Achievement:- 12 years experiences in IT company on research, development, support, delivery, pre-sales, and technology consultant across South East Asia while focusing on Indonesia, Singapore, China, and Malaysia.- Deep knowledge of the product's technology for Data ELT Pipeline, Content Storage Management, Commodity Trading, Risk Management, Automotive Manufacture and Business Dealer Online.- Great visibility to manage the infrastructure, resources and vendor, and capability to lead and guide the development teams on projects quality and delivery.- Good analyst and understanding of latest technology to do a product or solution architecture. Responsibility for the product technology research and troubleshot to support products delivery.- Strong lead skill to manage, guide and drive the development teams in different countries such Indonesia, Singapore, Malaysia, United States, and China, by exposing their strong point to take in charge of their respected specialties and responsibility.

experiences.title: Senior Data Engineer
experiences.summary:
- A senior member and reviewer of the Data team.
- Team member of the Kanban product development.
- Technical lead and architect of Data pipeline infrastructure.
- Designer member of Data Warehouse.
- DevOps of cloud computing services for Data infrastructure.

experiences.title: Senior Member of Technical Staff
experiences.summary:
- Technical lead and a member of the development team.
- Team member of the Scrum software development.
- Project code reviewer and quality control with Continuous Inspection in place.
- Partially as DevOps to support Continuous Integration / Delivery, and automation of the product
installation and upgrade process.
- Self-study and researcher as a technology radar to update the team about the latest technology
or architecture trend in recent year.

experiences.title: AVP, Technology
experiences.summary:
- Leading the products technology to support the CTRM business requirement.
- Managing the Research and Development department.
- Guiding Development department to solve the business modules challenges.
- Research and design the built-in components to support the delivery of business modules or
development team.
- Communicate and work together with Development, Delivery, Marketing and Product / Business
Team for project delivery.

experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer
experiences.summary:
- Technology consultant to support CTRM.
- Manage the products technology features.
- Enrich the products to follow up with the latest update or availability of new ready third-party
products.
- Guide the development team to do any product framework baselines changes.
- Pre-sales support.
- Single Sign-On (SSO) implementation.
- Embedded LDAP v3 implementation.
- Messaging broker server implementation to support integration with client third party
applications.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.summary: - Support existing client issues via email or track issues.\r\n- Analyst the business requirements and implement the modules to the products.\r\n- Pre-sales support.

experiences.title: Technology Trend Analyst
experiences.summary: - Develop in-house products to support the raw materials stock, manufacture process, claim or risk management, main dealer distribution.\r\n- Liferay implementation to replace the existing internal portal.
